content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide step-by-step instructions to build it.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 5 distinct blocks
- It consists of 2 layers
- Base layer has 3 blocks: a blue cube, a red U-shaped block, and a green cube
- Top layer has 2 blocks: a yellow rectangular block and an orange triangular/wedge block

Block selection from dictionary:
- Blue cube (Block #6)
- Red U-shaped block (Block #1)
- Green cube (Block #7)
- Yellow horizontal rectangular block (Block #11)
- Orange triangular/wedge block (Block #14)

Assembly order from bottom to top:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6 (blue cube on left)
    Step2: Move block with index 1 (red U-shaped block in middle)
    Step3: Move block with index 7 (green cube on right)
    Step4: Move block with index 11 (yellow rectangular block across top)
    Step5: Move block with index 14 (orange triangular block on top)
}

The blocks need to be placed exactly as shown, with the yellow rectangular block spanning across the blue and green cubes, and the orange triangular block sitting on top of the yellow block.
